item.description:
This Chinatown restaurant is the best kept secret in Boston. The food is good and the price (approximately $15) is a bargain. Almost all the other customers will be Asian. Sitz has held this event twice and it has always been an enjoyable evening.

Seating is limited, please RSVP by Jan 12th

PAYPAL is NOT available for this event...pay server directly.

Please call Tom Litrenta (781-665-5920) if you have any questions.

Directions: The restaurant is a 2 block walk from the Chinatown T station (Orange Line)The restaurant is between Beach and Essex Streets. Parking may be difficult, so it suggested to take the Orange Line.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for your host, Tom Litrenta
item.name: Dinner in Chinatown
